free_addons.name: Loan Against Insured Amount
free_addons.description: Allows policyholders to take a loan of up to 80% of the insured amount. The interest rate is determined by the insurance company based on current market conditions.
benefits: Financial flexibility during emergencies without surrendering the policy
conditions: Loan amount cannot exceed 80% of the insured sum
Interest rate may vary
free_addons.eligibility: According to the policy terms and conditions

free_addons.name: Grace Period for Payment
free_addons.description: Offers an additional 30 days to pay the premium without the policy being canceled.
benefits: Provides additional time to manage premium payments in case of delays
conditions: Policyholder must pay within the grace period to keep the policy active
free_addons.eligibility: According to the policy terms and conditions

free_addons.name: Discount for Salaried Employees
free_addons.description: Provides a 2% discount on the premium for salaried individuals earning at least 30,000 Nepali rupees per month.
benefits: Reduces premium costs for eligible policyholders
conditions: Proof of employment and salary required
free_addons.eligibility: According to the policy terms and conditions

free_addons.name: Online Discount
free_addons.description: Offers a 2-3% discount on the premium when the policy is purchased online.
benefits: Encourages online policy purchases with cost savings
conditions: Discount is only applicable to policies purchased via the insurance company’s website
free_addons.eligibility: According to the policy terms and conditions

free_addons.name: Free Annual Health Checkup Whole Body
free_addons.description: Provides an annual health checkup benefit worth 10% of the insured amount.
benefits: Early detection of health issues through partner hospitals
conditions: Only selected tests are covered at partner hospitals
free_addons.eligibility: According to the policy terms and conditions

free_addons.name: Free Lookup Period
free_addons.description: Allows policyholders time to review and compare policies without immediate commitment.
benefits: Flexibility to make informed decisions before continuing with the policy
conditions: Valid for a limited timeframe as per policy terms
free_addons.eligibility: According to the policy terms and conditions

free_addons.name: Policy Conversion
free_addons.description: Enables conversion from one policy type to another at a reduced cost.
benefits: Flexibility to adapt policies to changing needs
conditions: Subject to conversion fees as per policy terms
free_addons.eligibility: According to the policy terms and conditions

paid_addons.name: Accidental Death Benefit
paid_addons.description: Provides an additional payout equal to the insured amount in case of accidental death.
benefits: Financial security for the family in the event of accidental death
conditions: Valid only for accidental death claims
Policy must be active
paid_addons.eligibility: According to the policy terms and conditions

paid_addons.name: Term Rider
paid_addons.description: Provides the insured amount in case of the policyholder’s death, regardless of the cause.
benefits: Offers additional life coverage beyond the base policy
conditions: Must be added during policy issuance
paid_addons.eligibility: According to the policy terms and conditions

paid_addons.name: Critical Illness Payout
paid_addons.description: Provides a full payout of the insured amount upon diagnosis of a listed critical illness.
benefits: Financial support for medical treatments and recovery
conditions: Valid for specific critical illnesses as per policy terms
Policy must be active
paid_addons.eligibility: According to the policy terms and conditions

paid_addons.name: Critical Illness No Premium Pay
paid_addons.description: If diagnosed with a critical illness during the term, future premiums are waived while the insured amount is paid at the end of the term.
benefits: Reduces financial burden while ensuring coverage remains intact
conditions: Valid for listed critical illnesses as per policy terms
paid_addons.eligibility: According to the policy terms and conditions

paid_addons.name: Spouse Rider
paid_addons.description: Provides insurance coverage for the spouse equal to the policyholder’s insured amount.
benefits: Offers financial protection for the spouse under the same policy
conditions: Policyholder and spouse must both meet policy requirements
paid_addons.eligibility: According to the policy terms and conditions

paid_addons.name: Disability Payout
paid_addons.description: Pays out the insured amount as if it were a death claim in the event of a disability.
benefits: Provides financial support during permanent disability
conditions: Valid only for specified disabilities as per policy terms
paid_addons.eligibility: According to the policy terms and conditions

paid_addons.name: Disability No Premium Pay
paid_addons.description: Waives future premiums if the policyholder becomes disabled while continuing coverage until the term ends.
benefits: Eases financial burden during disability while maintaining coverage
conditions: Valid for specific disabilities as per policy terms
paid_addons.eligibility: According to the policy terms and conditions

paid_addons.name: Child Education Rider
paid_addons.description: Allocates 30% of the insured amount for a child’s education expenses, up to a maximum of 40%.
benefits: Provides funds for the child’s education, paid directly to schools or colleges
conditions: Amount is only payable to recognized educational institutions
paid_addons.eligibility: According to the policy terms and conditions

paid_addons.name: Hospital Rider
paid_addons.description: Covers up to 30% of the insured amount for hospital expenses during the policy term.
benefits: Provides financial support for hospital treatments
conditions: Valid for one claim within the policy term and only at partner hospitals
paid_addons.eligibility: According to the policy terms and conditions

paid_addons.name: Time Extension Rider
paid_addons.description: Allows policyholders to extend the policy term without recalculating premiums at the current rate.
benefits: Continues coverage without incurring higher premiums due to age or health changes
conditions: Extension must be requested at the end of the policy term
paid_addons.eligibility: According to the policy terms and conditions

paid_addons.name: Funeral Expense Rider
paid_addons.description: Provides 5% of the insured amount for funeral expenses in case of the policyholder’s death.
benefits: Eases the financial burden on family for funeral costs
conditions: Only payable in case of the policyholder’s death
paid_addons.eligibility: According to the policy terms and conditions

paid_addons.name: Employment Loss No Premium Rider
paid_addons.description: Waives premiums if the policyholder loses their job while actively seeking reemployment.
benefits: Provides premium relief during periods of unemployment
conditions: Proof of unemployment and active job search required
paid_addons.eligibility: According to the policy terms and conditions

paid_addons.name: Travel Add-on
paid_addons.description: Provides health insurance coverage during travel, up to 50% of the insured amount.
benefits: Covers health-related emergencies while traveling
conditions: Maximum claim is 50% of the insured amount for travel-related health issues
paid_addons.eligibility: According to the policy terms and conditions

paid_addons.name: Premium Return in Term Life
paid_addons.description: Refunds the premium amount at the end of the term if no claims were made.
benefits: Offers a refund of premiums as an additional benefit
conditions: Only the premium amount is refunded, excluding interest or additional payouts
paid_addons.eligibility: According to the policy terms and conditions
